remarks: Lemma for ~ hsmex .  Bound the order type of a limited-cardinality set of ordinals.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 14-Feb-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hsmexlem.o $e |- O = OrdIso ( _E , A ) $.
hsmexlem1 $p |- ( ( A C_ On /\ A ~<_* B ) -> dom O e. ( har ` ~P B ) ) $.
